column1: # MAXIMUM PHYSICAL RANGES for testing model limits
# These ranges are intentionally wide to allow the optimizer full freedom.

column2: there may be a code/data issue.

column1: # Physical range: 20-100 (very rough to very smooth channels)
# Convergence length [m] - exponential width decay scale
# Physical range: 5 km to 500 km (very funnel-shaped to nearly prismatic)
# Van den Burgh K coefficient - dispersion decay rate
# Physical range: 0.01 to 2.0 (very slow to very fast decay)
# Fischer mixing efficiency α - D0 = α * U_tidal * B
# Storage ratio - tidal prism correction for flats/mangroves
# Physical range: 1.0 (no storage) to 20.0 (large tidal flats)
# Physical range: 0.00001 to 0.01 m/s (clay to sand)
